Key Match Events: V. Tikoipau scored the opening goal for Tonga at 27 minutes
N. Maro scored Tonga's second goal at 38 minutes
H. Polovili scored Tonga's second penalty goal at 39 minutes
P. Mustonen scored for Cook Islands at 46 minutes with a substitution by T. Rimene-Albrett
T. Rimene-Albrett scored for Cook Islands at 63 minutes with a substitution by T. Mateariki
V. Tikoipau scored his second goal for Tonga at 71 minutes with substitutions by C. Kefu and V. Tai
V. Tukia scored for Tonga at 78 minutes with substitutions by T. Saghabi and T. Mateariki
D. Tuamoheloa scored for Tonga at 79 minutes with substitutions by P. Manu
C. Kefu scored for Tonga at 90(+1) minutes with substitutions by N. Tuakana
D. Tiputoa scored for Tonga at 90(+6) minutes with substitutions by E. Burrow
T. Ringi scored for Tonga at 90(+2) minutes with substitutions by L. Feke and T. Tu'amoheloa
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at J.S. Blatter Football Complex Tuanaimato Field 1, Apia
